participant_1.background:
I love my family and I'm sure they would love me no matter what.
i love the outdoors.
I hope my wedding planning business keeps booming as the weather warms up.
my dad is very strict with his kids.
my favorite book is david copperfield.

participant_2.background:
My parents are proud of me for following my musical dreams.
I enjoy watching my favorite childhood cartoons.
I do not really care about my appearance.
yellow is my favorite color.
I have my number and my freedom.

content.text: I am excited for the weather to warm up so that my wedding planning business can keep booming.
That sounds cool! I am not a big fan of weddings.
I just do not see the point of spending so much money on one day.
I get that. For me it is about celebrating my love with my family and friends.
That makes sense. I do not really care about my appearance so I do not put a lot of emphasis on dressing up.
I am the opposite. I love getting dressed up and looking my best.
I guess we are just different people.
That is okay. We can still be friends.
Absolutely! I love meeting new people.
Me too! What is your favorite color?
My favorite color is yellow. It is a happy color.
I love yellow too! It is so cheerful.
I am glad you like it.
